dynamodb_endpoint.title: Endpoint
dynamodb_endpoint.description: This is your DynamoDB endpoint url.(if you are working with AWS DynamoDB, just leave empty).

dynamodb_table_name_prefix.title: Table name prefix
dynamodb_table_name_prefix.description: The prefix to use when naming DynamoDB tables.

access_key_id.description: The access key id to access the DynamoDB. Airbyte requires Read and Write permissions to the DynamoDB.
access_key_id.title: DynamoDB Key Id

secret_access_key.description: The corresponding secret to the access key id.
secret_access_key.title: DynamoDB Access Key

override_partition_key_flag.description: Do you want to override partition key '_airbyte_ab_id' ?
override_partition_key_flag.title: Override Partition Key?

override_partition_key.description: The corresponding partition key available in source data. Default: 'uuid'
override_partition_key.title: Override Partition Key Name

enable_sort_key.description: Do you want sort key on your table? Default: 'sync_time'
enable_sort_key.title: Enable Sort Key?

override_sort_key_flag.description: Do you want to override sort key 'sync_time' ?
override_sort_key_flag.title: Override Sort Key?

override_sort_key.description: The corresponding sort key available in source data. Default: 'updated_at'
override_sort_key.title: Override Sort Key Name

override_data_key_flag.description: Do you want to override data key '_airbyte_data' ?
override_data_key_flag.title: Override Data Key?

override_data_key.description: The corresponding data will be under the key name. Default: 'data'
override_data_key.title: Override Data Key Name
